page.title: 14Bradninch Papermill (cont)
page.content: Wiggins Teape make writing paper, blotting paper, filter paper, paper for batteries, dust bags and a base paper for formica work surfaces. In 1984 they made 10,500 tonnes. The mill has lots of danger and the manager has to make sure it is as safe as possible. Some men work in very noisy conditions and need to wear ear plugs. 195 people work there, 138 men and 13 women make the paper and 27 in administration jobs. The mill is working from 6am. Monday until 6pm. on Saturday 24 hours a day. Most people work 5 days a week on day or night shift. They have five weeks holiday (Easter, Christmas and Bank Holidays).
